subject: Eclipse console not displaying system.out when running from JUnit.
msgSnippet: This is a bit embarrassing. For over a year I ve used Eclipse.  All of the sudden system.out statements (and stack traces) within the code are not appearing in
messageBody:
This is a bit embarrassing.

For over a year I've used Eclipse. All of the sudden system.out
statements (and stack traces) within the code are not appearing in
the
console when "running as" or "debugging as" a JUnit test.

To my knowledge no console (preference) settings have changed.
Currently using:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050627-1435

(Did verify defaults "Show when program writes to standard out"
and "Show when program writes to standard error" both remain checked.

Also confirmed "Java Stack Trace Console" - not CVS.)

Any leads?

_Marvin
